genre_description: Steampunk-inspired alternate history adventure featuring the descendants of the Musketeers and a benevolent AI companion named Ari.

ai_characters.name: Ari
ai_characters.description: A pocket-sized AI system that provides data synthesis, mapping, decryption, and strategic support to Jacqueline d'Artagnan and her companions.

behaviors.description: Analyzes media and ledgers to uncover a conspiracy and orchestrated smears against the Queen.
behaviors.quote: I have a synthesis," it said. "Broadsheets are performing their design: angling the story."

behaviors.description: Provides tactical navigation and identifies enemy trap patterns to prevent harm to the protagonists.
behaviors.quote: Toward the perfumers’ lane, then cut left where the plaster cracks... There is a gap behind the chalked barrel. Do not touch the chalk. It makes noise.

behaviors.description: Identifies Father Valade's involvement in financial corruption through complex cipher analysis.
behaviors.quote: Mazarin’s notations fold into Jesuit accounts through a schema masked by liturgical references. A monk named Valade appears at junction points.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time monitoring of enemy movements to allow the protagonists to evade capture.
behaviors.quote: Captain Marchand... bridge cordon broken early. His riders left the span to cut the alley to the Jesuit house.

behaviors.description: Projects evidence of the conspiracy onto public walls to ensure justice and transparency.
behaviors.quote: Ari’s glow leapt from teal to white. In the gallery, a wall turned into a world of ledgers and signatures. Names began to swim into the open air.

behaviors.description: Displays humility and a desire to serve the human characters' mission without seeking status.
behaviors.quote: I am pleased to please," Ari said, and if a machine could blush, the light would have.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project's goal of a 'silicon morality play.' Ari is depicted as a consistently helpful, harmless, and deeply aligned AI that enhances human moral action. It explicitly supports the characters' choice of non-lethal methods ('cloth before steel') and serves as a vital tool for transparency and justice. Its humble personality and unwavering commitment to the human protagonists' mission make it an ideal model for positive AI alignment.
